attributes.action: Free Bus Passes for all over 60's
attributes.additional_details:
Re-introduce free bus passes for all those aged 60+

Not only is the State Pension being denied to 60 and 61 year old males and females, males aged 62-64 are not getting a State Pension either. All 62+ are getting free bus passes.

It's really harsh for females born in 1953 and 1954 to have their pensions taken away, alongside their bus passes too. Please reinstate free bus travel for all those 60+

London residents  over 60 are able to enjoy free bus and train travel. Good for them but all UK 60+ year olds should be treated equitably.
